extendedInfo.description: Flies are very nasty bugs. They transmit diseases muistas and why you should always stay far away from them. In this game you must help the girl to kill the flies throwing many boogers on them. Have fun and be quick so that the girl does not get any disease.Safety is paramount. So now, we want to kill the flies that bother this little girl. To play is easy! Just position the fly swatter on the fly and click with the mouse. Take care that the fly get much screen time, Let's have fun?Help the little girl to kill the flies that are lurking around your head.
